function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No clean air supplied to the chamber","Impact":"Increased VOCs concentrations that can pose health risks to individuals in the office environment","Mitigation":"Supplying clean air to the chamber to reduce VOCs concentrations","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilations systems","People":"Individuals in the office environment","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Chamber leakage effect","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of CADR and contaminant removal rate","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of the chamber to prevent leakage","Technologies":"Leak detection systems, maintenance protocols","People":"Facility management, testing technicians","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Surface adsorption effect","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of contaminant removal mechanisms","Mitigation":"Implement surface treatment to reduce adsorption effect, use standardized test protocols","Technologies":"Surface treatment technologies, standardized testing equipment","People":"Facility management, testing technicians","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
